title: S14 Ep84: Salem, Witches, & Magic
itunes:title: Salem, Witches, & Magic
description:
Double double toil and trouble; Fire burn and caldron bubble on BEYOND the DARKNESS Salem, WItches &Magic episode with guest Michelle Belanger!

Hot of the success of Haunted Salem Live and deep into the month of October we discuss all things Withes, Warlocks, Magics and Myths with Michelle Belanger. Creepy stories, Real Histories and the real Power of Magic in a fun filled conversation with a living legend in the field.

Visit Michelle's site: https://www.michellebelanger.com/
